<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;&#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42; Creates a remark parser that can be used to parse the buffer located in \\p</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42; Buf of size \\p Size bytes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42; \\p Buf cannot be &#96;NULL&#96;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42; This function should be paired with LLVMRemarkParserDispose() to avoid</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42; leaking resources.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42; \\since REMARKS&#95;API&#95;VERSION=1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42;/</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">extern</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcremarks/#ga8065752effe66fd6b55586f04028cccd">LLVMRemarkParserRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcremarks/#ga3876e400217122e91a34c002981bc82d">LLVMRemarkParserCreateBitstream</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Buf,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;&#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42; Returns the next remark in the file.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42; The value pointed to by the return value needs to be disposed using a call to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42; LLVMRemarkEntryDispose().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42; All the entries in the returned value that are of LLVMRemarkStringRef type</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42; will become invalidated once a call to LLVMRemarkParserDispose is made.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42; If the parser reaches the end of the buffer, the return value will be &#96;NULL&#96;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42; In the case of an error, the return value will be &#96;NULL&#96;, and:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42; 1) LLVMRemarkParserHasError() will return &#96;1&#96;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42; 2) LLVMRemarkParserGetErrorMessage() will return a descriptive error</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42;    message.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42; An error may occur if:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42; 1) An argument is invalid.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42; 2) There is a parsing error. This can occur on things like malformed YAML.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42; 3) There is a Remark semantic error. This can occur on well-formed files with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42;    missing or extra fields.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42; Here is a quick example of the usage:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42; &#96;&#96;&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42; LLVMRemarkParserRef Parser = LLVMRemarkParserCreateYAML(Buf, Size);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42; LLVMRemarkEntryRef Remark = NULL;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42; while ((Remark = LLVMRemarkParserGetNext(Parser))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42;    // use Remark</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42;    LLVMRemarkEntryDispose(Remark); // Release memory.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42; bool HasError = LLVMRemarkParserHasError(Parser);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42; LLVMRemarkParserDispose(Parser);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42; &#96;&#96;&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42; \\since REMARKS&#95;API&#95;VERSION=0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42;/</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">extern</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcremarks/#ga124978db2f97610eed656328fe801d64">LLVMRemarkEntryRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcremarks/#gada1d7ab2d57b735d67fa095bc099cc7f">LLVMRemarkParserGetNext</a>(<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcremarks/#ga8065752effe66fd6b55586f04028cccd">LLVMRemarkParserRef</a> Parser);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;&#42;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42;</span></CodeLine>
